text: 4.17 Apo 19.22, Plp 2.19-22 Adek anɨb ak nep, ñɨ mapen yad Timoti nop agyokɨnek. Bɨ anɨb ak ne bɨ tep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, Bɨawl wog ak gɨtep gup ak. Nop agyoken, am nɨbop nɨgɨnɨgab. Pen yad Klays nop chɨg tep gɨl pel gɨpin tek, ne nɨgtep gɨl, am gos tɨmud nɨbop ak pag yɨkek nɨgɨnɨgabɨm. Pel gɨpin anɨb ak, Klays binɨb ne man keke pelpel apnan gɨpal okok kɨlop agñɨbin.
